Drivers of taxis, private hire vehicles and buses and coaches with 9 or more seats that are licensed with the DVLA as either in tax class 'Bus' or 'Reduced Pollution Bus' do not have to pay the Congestion Charge.

However, if vehicles with 9 or more seats (including the driver's seat) are registered with the DVLA in other tax classes, the vehicle's can register with us to qualify for the 100% discount from the Congestion Charge.
The types of vehicle that qualify for this discount include work buses, community service buses and private hire mini buses.

ULEZ : The 9 + Seater discount only applies to the Congestion Charge. If your vehicle does not meet the emissions standards you will still need to pay the ULEZ charge to drive in the Congestion Charge zone.
You can only register 1 vehicle for this discount. If you want to change the vehicle details you entered, use the 'Back' button.

Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, your vehicle is registered for a 100% discount from the Congestion Charge. If you believe this is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, add this vehicle or apply for a discount, then you can continue.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
